title: Hour 1 - (04-02-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - (04-02-20)
description:
'The Odd Couple' Chris Broussard and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Dannettes, and the guys debate whether or not the timing of LeBron James' plan to do a video breakdown of his greatest games is a subtle shot at Michael Jordan, explain why Lew Alcindor (Kareem Abdul-Jabbar) - and not Jordan - is easily the greatest player in college basketball history, and tells us why the New York Knicks are absolutely not the most disappointing franchise in sports.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
